post:
Hello all,

I hope we are all doing well and staying safe in these dangerous times.

We own our own IP ranges, all of our equipment, and colocate with FiberHub in Las Vegas, NV and Quadranet in Miami, FL.

Our latest offering is NVMe based KVM VPSs in Las Vegas and Miami. Las Vegas is currently sold out but will be available soon.
